Room.Name: Appleton Road
Room.ShortDescription: You are travelling along Appleton Road, just northwest of Nagaritha Drive.
Room.LongDescription: Appleton runs northwest to southeast through the southern section of town. On the east side of the road, you can partially see the Circle- Bar Ranch House and the Cattle Ranch, where hundreds of cows must be grazing. On the west side of the road is the Slaughterhouse and the Preservation Center, where the cattle are humanely destroyed and then brought to town to be sold.
